dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3431 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the volumetric excise tax credit for liquid fuel derived from natural gas through the Fischer-Tropsch process.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Higgins of Louisiana (for himself, Mr. Graves of Louisiana, and Mr. Abraham) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the volumetric excise tax credit for liquid fuel derived from natural gas through the Fischer-Tropsch process.

section.header: Volumetric excise tax credit for liquid fuel derived from natural gas through Fischer-Tropsch process

subsection.text: Section 6426(d)(2)(E) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting or at the end;
by striking liquid fuel which meets and inserting the following:
by adding at the end, as amended by the preceding provisions of this section, the following new clause:

clause.text: is derived from natural gas through such process,

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to any sale or use for any period after the date of the enactment of this Act.
